name: Mountain View Lonavala
description: A beautiful hotel at the edge of the Lonavala peak, offering breathtaking views of the Sahyadri mountains. Perfect for a peaceful getaway.
address: Lions Point Road, Near Tiger Point, Lonavala

name: Sunset Beach Resort Goa
description: Luxurious beachfront resort with direct access to pristine white sand beaches. Experience the perfect blend of relaxation and adventure.
address: Baga Beach Road, Calangute, North Goa

name: Heritage Palace Udaipur
description: A majestic heritage property overlooking Lake Pichola. Experience royal hospitality in this beautifully restored palace hotel.
address: Lake Palace Road, City Palace Complex, Udaipur

name: Golden Temple View Amritsar
description: Centrally located hotel with stunning views of the Golden Temple. Experience the spiritual heart of Punjab.
address: Hall Bazaar, Near Golden Temple, Amritsar

name: Hill Station Retreat Manali
description: Cozy mountain retreat nestled in the Himalayas. Perfect for adventure enthusiasts and nature lovers.
address: Old Manali Road, Near Hadimba Temple, Manali

name: Backwaters Resort Alleppey
description: Tranquil resort on the banks of Kerala's famous backwaters. Experience authentic Kerala culture and cuisine.

name: Desert Camp Jaisalmer
description: Authentic desert camping experience with luxury amenities. Enjoy camel safaris and traditional Rajasthani entertainment.

name: Beach Paradise Puri
description: Seaside hotel with panoramic views of the Bay of Bengal. Close to the famous Jagannath Temple.

name: Tea Estate Stay Darjeeling
description: Charming colonial-style hotel surrounded by tea plantations. Wake up to stunning views of Mount Kanchenjunga.

name: City Center Business Hotel Mumbai
description: Modern business hotel in the heart of Mumbai's financial district. Perfect for corporate travelers.
